about_the_game:
An item pack to support your adventures in Onigiri! Get various useful items and an exclusive accessory!

Contents:
- Onigiri Coins: 300OC
- Soul Egg x30
- Gacha Ticket x10
- Vanguard Basket -Support Pack- x1
- Accessory: Ghastly Ninjustsu manual x1

Only one pack may be purchased per account.
Onigiri Coins are required to obtain certain in-game contents.


Using the Vanguard Basket -Support Pack- will randomly grant a Summoner's Scroll for one of the following characters:

Miyamoto Musashi
Dark Miyamoto Musashi
Sarutobi Sasuke
Himiko
Izuna Tri-Tail
Sakata Kintoki
Shuten-Douji
Oda Nobunaga
Lancelot
Uesugi Kenshin
Takeda Shingen
Gawain
Toyotomi Hideyoshi
Shibata Katsuie
Koujirou (Flying Swallow)
Ono no Komachi

*The drop rate for each character is identical.

content_descriptors.notes: note: Includes violent expressions and highly exposed clothing.

detailed_description:

Only one pack may be purchased per account.

name: Onigiri Support Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 10 32bit・64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6300
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 7800GT, AMD RADEON HD2900XT
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card (DirectX 9.0c and above)

short_description: An item support pack for your adventure in the free-to-play MMO RPG Onigiri! Item pack includes rare items, a limited Accessory, and a random support character!
